name: Narrative Case Study
description: A sample case demonstrating narrative comprehension and storyline coherence.

memories.content: Sarah moved to a small coastal town after graduating from college.
The town had a mysterious lighthouse that locals believed was haunted.
Sarah found a job as a marine biologist at the local research center.
While studying unusual marine patterns, Sarah noticed strange lights coming from the lighthouse at night.
The old lighthouse keeper, Mr. Jenkins, warned Sarah to stay away from the lighthouse during full moons.
